user_instruction: 'Respond to Alex'"'"'s request for background info (alex@freelancedesign.com). You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Company Background Details for Alex’s Project

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Alex (alex@freelancedesign.com) is ready to move forward on the marketing materials and has asked for a concise packet of InnoTech background information to guide his design work.

Could you please gather and share the relevant company background details with him at your earliest convenience? Feel free to pull anything helpful from your Gmail and the NotionManager workspace—brand guidelines, recent press releases, product vision notes, key timelines, etc.

Thanks so much for your help, and let me know if you need anything from me to make this easier.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
